metadata.description: Cross-platform offline-first mobile/desktop app for construction inspectors
metadata.session_notes: Session 349: Code review done (3 DRY/dead-code fixes). Fixture regen revealed: renderer works at 300 DPI but region detector ignores grid data → 0 headers → 0 regions → 0 items. Brainstormed grid-aware region detection (Options B/C). Decision deferred.

active_blockers.title: Region detector ignores grid line data — 0 table regions on grid pages
active_blockers.notes: Renderer works at 300 DPI (confirmed). Cell-cropped OCR fragments header text ('IB' instead of 'Item No.') → row classifier finds 0 headers → region detector creates 0 regions. Grid detector knows all 6 pages are tables but region detector doesn't use this data. Design options: (B) grid+header hybrid in detector, (C) pipeline-level split. Plan: plans/2026-02-15-grid-aware-region-detection-design.md
active_blockers.impact: Blocks pipeline accuracy. Current: 0 items / 0% match. Target: 131 items / 95% match.

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Deprecated APIs used for field mapping (Syncfusion migrating to new API surface)
dependencies_at_risk.action_needed: Audit before next upgrade, test IDR template field mapping

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Platform channel timeout issues on some devices (GitHub issues open)

team_context.work_style: Orchestration-based (user defines plans, Claude executes with agents)
